doc.after: As of January 2015[update], Project Gutenberg claimed over 48,900[2] items in its collection, with an average of over fifty new e-books being added each week.[15] These are primarily works of literature from the Western cultural tradition. In addition to literature such as novels, poetry, short stories and drama, Project Gutenberg also has cookbooks, reference works and issues of periodicals.[16] The Project Gutenberg collection also has a few non-text items such as audio files and music notation files.[17]
